title: Wiggle and Chain Reaction are slashing bike prices for Black Friday with up to 43% off
content:
Wiggle and Chain Reaction have slashed prices for road, gravel and mountain bikes this Black Friday.

The online cycling retailers have up to 40 per cent off a huge variety of bikes, from hybrids to electric mountain bikes.

They aren’t only offering savings on budget options, but on bikes with top-spec components including SRAM Red AXS and XX Eagle Transmission drivetrains.

Whether the savings are due to the companies’ recent financial woes is unknown, but what we do know is there are some great deals to be had.

Wiggle and Chain Reaction Black Friday bike deals

Nukeproof Giga 290 RS – £6,499.99 £3,899.99 (save 40%)

Chain Reaction

Nukeproof’s Giga features a full-monocoque carbon fibre frame that has 170mm of rear-wheel travel but can be mulleted to add 10mm more.

The spec is off the charts for its price. The bike has a RockShox Super Deluxe Ultimate rear shock, a 180mm RockShox Zeb Ultimate fork and SRAM’s XX Eagle Transmission.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£3,899.99)

Vitus Vitesse EVO Red AXS – £5,499 £3,499.99 (save 38%)

Vitus

The Vitus Vitess EVO scored 4.5 stars out of 5 in testing, and this model with SRAM’s top-tier electronic groupset is a bargain with 38 per cent off.

  • Buy now from Wiggle (£3,499.99)

​​Vitus Venon EVO-GR Rival AXS – £3,499.99 £2,699.99 (save 23%)

Vitus

The Vitus Venon EVO-RS won our Bike of the Year award 2023, and this gravel version uses the same frameset.

With 23 per cent off, it’s not the biggest saving on offer at Chain Reaction, but it is one of the best gravel bikes on the market.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£2,699.99) 

If you’re feeling flush, the Force-equipped version of the bike is also available with a 26 per cent saving.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£3,199.99) 

Nukeproof Mega 290 Comp – £2,999.99 £1,649.99 (save 45%)

Chain Reaction

At £1,649.99, the Nukeproof Mega 290 Comp looks like a great deal for those looking to get into enduro racing or hitting gnarliest trails.

It features 160mm rear-suspension travel that is controlled by a RockShox Super Deluxe Select R rear shock, while the front end is supported by a 170mm RockShox Domain.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£1,649.99)

Cube Touring Urban bike – £799 £494.99 (save 38%)

Cube

The Cube Touring Urban bike is available at a discounted price of £494, down from £799.

This versatile commuter is ideal for both daily rides and weekend adventures. Equipped with rear rack, mudguards and dynamo lights, it’s a practical choice for many riders.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction (£494.99)

Vitus Energie EVO – £2,299.99 £1,299.99 (save 43%)

Jack Luke / Immediate Media

The Vitus Energie Evo is, nominally, a cyclocross bike, but in testing we found it to be a perfectly competent all-rounder.

And you can’t really go wrong when such a versatile bike is discounted by a whopping 43 per cent.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction £1,299.99

author: Stan Portus
